name: MORRIS COLLEGE
sampleDescriptions: Building relationships with policymakers to cultivate support for the Colleges initiatives and priorities and overall support for historically black colleges and universities.

Building relationships with policymakers, including the South Carolina delegation and the bipartisan HBCU caucus to cultivate support for the College's initiatives and priorities and overall support f
